        This method is scanning the list of events falling under a given starting and end time stamp
        Parameters:

        end - the end time stamp
        slide - the sliding interval count
        Returns:
        this list of events with time stamps

      • getEventCount

        public long getEventCount(long referenceTime)
        This method returns the number of event count which has the timestamp lesser than the reference timestamp
        Parameters:
        referenceTime - timestamp to which we compare the event time to filter them out
        Returns:
        the number of event count which is less than or equal to the reference time

      • getEarliestEventTimestamp

        public long getEarliestEventTimestamp(long start,
                                      long end)
        provides the event with earliest timestamp between end and start timestamps by scanning through the queue of messages.
        Parameters:
        start - starting timestamp (excluded for calculation)
        end - ending timestamp (included for calculation)
        Returns:
        the minimum timestamp the queue between start and end
